name: Finder Love: Hoshino Aki - Nangoku Trouble Rendezvous
name_original: Finder Love: Hoshino Aki - Nangoku Trouble Rendezvous
description:
Finder Love: Hoshino Aki - Nangoku Trouble Rendezvous is an action game. It came out on 05-09-2009.
Finder Love: Hoshino Aki - Nangoku Trouble Rendezvous is available on PSP.
